items.sentence: Good things happen when you least expect them to.

I can't believe Tom really expects me to do that.
I can't help thinking Tom should be here with us.
Tom doesn't have any other option but to do that.
Tom doesn't drink tequila as often as he used to.
Your sister enjoys watching sumo wrestling on TV.
This is the only kimono that my mother bought me.
Tom helped the little old lady to cross the road.
It's as if Tom and Mary were made for each other.
Tom always gives 100 percent in whatever he does.
Tom is going back to the hospital this afternoon.
I wouldn't have known that if Tom hadn't told me.

This is something that only a teenager would buy.
I was thirsty and wanted something cold to drink.
Pregnant women often experience morning sickness.
I'm not completely deaf, but I'm hard of hearing.
If you behave yourself, I'll give you some candy.
Do you really think I'm going to let you do that?
What makes you think that Tom would ever do that?
I have reason to think we'll never see Tom again.
Tom seemed to think you and I used to be married.
I used to think taking walks was a waste of time.
I thought it was impossible to sleep for so long.
I heard that there were alligators in the sewers.
Mary is a good actress and she's quite beautiful.
The only time that I wear glasses is when I read.
You've chosen the wrong man to pick a fight with.
My father is a butcher and I plan to be one, too.
Tom looks a lot like you did when you were young.
Tom is the most competitive person I've ever met.
The dress in the shop's window caught Mary's eye.
If you want to be happy, make someone else happy.
You should not do that kind of thing by yourself.
It isn't possible to get away from your problems.
Tom couldn't afford to pay for his son's funeral.
We hope that we don't have another losing season.
Let's discuss how we can get this done by Monday.
Tom and Mary bought a house with a swimming pool.
Why do you always want to argue about everything?
Tom not only ate his dessert, he also ate Mary's.
Tom sat next to Mary, waiting for her to wake up.
We need to know whether Tom will be there or not.
I think I have the solution to all your problems.
You didn't have to do that if you didn't want to.
Don't be scared. My dog hasn't bitten anyone yet.
Can you lend me a guitar to use on stage tonight?
We're looking forward to hearing about your trip.
Tom carries pictures of his family in his wallet.
I'm not suggesting that any of us should do that.
It's been a while since I've told you I love you.
I'm sure that Tom will happy to do that for Mary.
Is it true that women never make jokes about men?
Mary was using drugs, so the police arrested her.
Tom isn't strong enough to swim across the river.
Detectives are questioning the suspect right now.
How long do you think that the meeting will last?
Man is the only animal that blushes. Or needs to.
They continued eating as if nothing had happened.
Be respectful to your superiors, if you have any.
I climbed Mt. Fuji last month for the first time.
This is the house where I lived when I was young.
Are you sure you want to donate all these things?
Are you sure you want to run for class president?
I want to know if you'll go to the dance with me.
You're going to Australia next month, aren't you?
You're not taking that job in Australia, are you?
You're supposed to be doing that now, aren't you?
You're the one who planted that tree, aren't you?
You're the one who started the fight, aren't you?
I don't think that anybody notices what Tom does.
I don't think that Tom needs to do that tomorrow.
I don't think that Tom needs to do that for Mary.
I don't think that Tom has to do that by himself.
I don't think that I've ever seen Tom doing that.
I don't think that I need to tell Tom what to do.
I don't think that I have to tell Tom to do that.
I don't think that I can do that faster than Tom.
I don't think that I can do that better than Tom.
I'm going to drink my beer while it's still cold.
What I'm trying to say to you is that I love you.

There sure is a lot of traffic on the road today.

The stew tasted even better today than yesterday.
